item.title: Using STL Containers with pybind11
item.description: In my old post, I have shared how to use pybind11 to accelerate execution of Python code.

item.title: GNU Make FAQ
item.description: GNU Make is a build automation tool typically used on Linux systems1. Below I will summarize a list of FAQs, which explain how Make works and how to use Make.

item.title: Pybind11 hands on
item.description: To accelerate the execution of some performance critical code, we can write the code in C++ with the help of pybind11 and export the C++ code as shared library1. Then we can import the shared library as a module and enjoy speed boost.
